SEARCH
Package cn.nukkit.network.connection.netty.codec.compression

Class SimpleCompressionStrategy

java.lang.Object
cn.nukkit.network.connection.netty.codec.compression.SimpleCompressionStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
CompressionStrategy
public class SimpleCompressionStrategy extends Object implements CompressionStrategy
A simple compression strategy that uses the same compression for all packets, but supports decompression using all Bedrock protocol supported algorithms.
